title: U.S. begins airdropping food in Gaza, but it's a less-than-ideal means of aid delivery
description: The U.S. military on Saturday began dropping food over the war-torn enclave. Costly and inefficient, delivering humanitarian aid by air is no substitute for delivering it by land, aid groups say.

title: Confessions of a continuity cop
description: You know that scene in Pretty Woman when Julia Roberts is eating a croissant that is suddenly a pancake? Continuity issues like that crop up all the time. Whether you let it distract you is your call.

title: A man fights expectations in 'I'm So Glad We Had This Time Together'
description: Maurice Vellekoop's graphic memoir is an impressive book by an artist, a cartoonist, staking a claim — presenting a life lived willfully resisting other people's inconsistent, harmful attitudes.

title: Celebrated stylemaker and self-named 'geriatric starlet' Iris Apfel dies at age 102
description: Apfel's late-in-life emergence as a stylemaker was celebrated in magazines and museums. Her company made reproduction fabrics for the White House for decades. She became a fashion model at 97.
